name: Doduo

evolution.description: Doduo can evolve into Dodrio at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Twin Bird Pokémon. Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Attacks against this Pokémon have disadvantage when it is confused.
